name: tads's adventure
description:
this is a shooter about a frog man named tad

the ogars are up to some evil bussins making slimes that kill all so that way the ogars can take over the wourld.

controls: awsd to move e to shot and you can do a shotgun jump by pressing down

good luck and have fun

update: hello guys, i have updated the game, the game is in 1.1 i would say, it is more controller compatible and esc now resets the level. due to controller compatible, aiming will feel a little off for now but i will try and fix it.
